TRI.BE

Introduction

Kim Hyun Bin, better known as HyunBin, is a South Korean singer under TR Entertainment. She is the Main Rapper, Main Dancer, Lead Vocalist and Center of the girl group TRI.BE. She was also a former member of the disbanded trainee group Banana Culture Newkid.
